meanings.definition: To hit or strike with a blow.
meanings.sent1: He boffed the ball with his bat.
meanings.sent2: She boffed the door closed in frustration.
meanings.sent3: The clown accidentally boffed his own nose during the performance.
meanings.sent4: The thunder boffed the sky, announcing the storm's arrival.
meanings.sent5: The hammer boffed the nail into the wood effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: The characters in the movie boffed in the romantic scene.
meanings.sent2: They giggled after they boffed behind the school.
meanings.sent3: The aliens in the sci-fi film boffed to save their planet from destruction.
meanings.sent4: The secret agent boffed his way into the enemy's headquarters.
meanings.sent5: The pirates boffed under the moonlight on the deserted island.
